pullrequest.title: Fixing a deadlock I introduced in the base station plugin

content.raw:
looks good to me. I couldn't get reproduce a deadlock any more in this branch with `virtual_stix.ign`

I did however run into another deadlock problem when testing with `competition.ign`. This time it happens on startup so it's a different issue.
content.html:
looks good to me. I couldn't get reproduce a deadlock any more in this branch with virtual_stix.ign

I did however run into another deadlock problem when testing with competition.ign. This time it happens on startup so it's a different issue.
